title: minerjones
author: minerjones
created_time: June 01, 2022, 12:35:10 AMLast edit: June 01, 2022, 12:39:32 PM by minerjones
content: From maker Bitcoin Penny comes two of their precious metal offerings from 2018LOT 1: 2018 Bitcoin Penny Platinum 1/4oz (Only 70 produced)LOT 2: 2018 Bitcoin Penny Gold 1/4oz (Only 50 produced)*Each coin will come in plastic capsule/foam ring as seen*Grading available at end of auctionLOT 1LOT 2STARTING BID LOT 1: 0.0075BTCSTARTING BID LOT 2: 0.0150BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: JUNE 6th, 2022, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOTIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made PER LOT, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference
